Text: yes, this is episode 8. Season 1 goes from 1 to 10, but for some reason online it is only 1 to 9, which is wrong, then season 2 episode 1 online is actually the last episode of season 1, so it messes everything up. Instead of rectifying the problem, they just keep uploading with the wrong episode number.

So basically, we are missing episodes 7 and 10 from S2!?!
